Locale.Value:
Messenger
- You can open documents and apps directly within Lark, without having to use your web browser.
- You can open chats and apps on separate panes within Lark. This lets you chat and view your work at the same time.
- There are five new color themes available, to let you customize how Lark looks.
Meetings
- You can now view the original subtitles and translated subtitles at the same time, giving you even more options in multilingual meetings.
- The video meeting toolbar has been optimized to make it easier to share content and send reactions.
Base
- The mobile interface for Base has been streamlined to make it easier to browse through records on the go.
- You can now schedule notifications for filling out forms as well as send reminders to recipients who have not filled out the form in Lark Forms.
- You can send automated messages using different identities, such as your own identity, a personalized Base bot, or Base Assistant.
- Base dashboards can now be viewed in full screen for greater effect.
Docs
- You can now copy only selected items on a board as an image and paste them outside the document.
- You can also export the whole board as a vector image.
Sheets
- Sheets now supports bubble charts, which can be used to show the relationship and distribution of your data set.
- Sheets now supports sparkline charts, allowing you pack useful data insights into a single cell.
Tasks
- You can switch to Gantt chart view in a task list to help you visualize and plan your next project.
Email
- Large attachments do not expire. This lets recipients view past attachments at any time, even after a long period.

即时消息
- 文档或应用可直接在客户端中打开，告别频繁切换
- 你可在客户端内分页打开消息群组与应用，边聊天边查看应用，提升工作与沟通效率
- 默认主题全新升级，还带来多个新主题配色，让你的办公体验更清爽简洁
视频会议
- 会议开启字幕后，支持同时显示原文和译文，跨语言沟通更轻松
- 视频会议控制栏优化，共享操作更突出，回应发送更便捷
多维表格
- 多维表格移动端全新升级，交互界面更美观，表格视图与卡片视图体验更提升
- 新版问卷支持定时发送填写通知，还可向未填写者发送催填通知，无需手动提醒
- 多维表格自动化流程支持以个人、多维表格应用等多种身份发送自动化消息，让消息来源更清晰
- 支持全屏展示多维表格仪表盘，直观获取数据信息，紧密关注业务动态
云文档
- 支持选中画板内部分图形或图片，一键复制为图片并粘贴至文档外
- 你可将画板导出为矢量图，超大画板也能清晰导出和使用
表格
- 表格新增气泡图，清晰展示数据之间的关系和分布
- 表格新增迷你图，你可在单元格内嵌入迷你图表，数据趋势和对比一目了然
任务
- 新增任务甘特图，方便总览进展，让任务管理更清晰
邮箱
- 超大附件永久有效，便于收件人随时查看过往附件
